mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_name as jiaoshiName ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_phone as jiaoshiPhone ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_id_number as jiaoshiIdNumber ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_photo as jiaoshiPhoto ,jiaoshi.kemu_types as kemuTypes ,jiaoshi.jiaoshi_email as jiaoshiEmail
FROM kebiao a left JOIN jiaoshi jiaoshi ON a.jiaoshi_id = jiaoshi.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.banji_types = #{params.banjiTypes}
and a.xingqi_types = #{params.xingqiTypes}
and ( a.jiaoshi_id = #{params.jiaoshiId} )
and a.jiaoshi_id IS NOT NULL
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiName},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiPhone},'%')
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiIdNumber},'%')
and jiaoshi.kemu_types = #{params.kemuTypes}
and jiaoshi.jiaoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoshiEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
